source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: How to Animate to Music using Toon Boom Harmony

visible_instructors.name: Tony

items.headline: Learn how you can create beautiful 2D animated shorts or videos, set to music
objectives_summary: Animate characters dancing to a beat.
Animate lip synched vocals
Rig characters in Toon Boom Harmony using parenting, and various deformers

items.title: Dynamic 2D Character Animation and Character Design Workflow
items.headline: Learn how character design and character animation work together.
objectives_summary: Work with timeline and Spriter free addition
Develop a wide range of animation classes and states
Develop advanced cell shading techniques and line art manipulation

items.title: BIM and Augmented Reality for Architects and Engineers
items.headline: Create Interactive AR Application to your Revit Model and Inspire Your client using Unity 2020 and Vuforia 9
objectives_summary: Learn How to Create Interactive Application for your Construction Project
Learn Basics of Augmented Reality with Building Information Modeling
Learn How to Install unity 2020 and Vuforia 9

items.title: Create stunning book trailer videos in HD
items.headline: How to source and create images, source footage and music, and utilize a robust video platform to wow your viewers
objectives_summary: Source Royalty Free Music for Video Creation
Source Video Footage for Video Creation
Source Images for Video Creation

items.title: Create Objects Procedurally With Geometry Nodes In Blender
items.headline: Begin procedurally creating your 3D objects and scenes using non destructive techniques with geometry nodes in Blender
objectives_summary: Create objects using nodes
Make objects procedural in how they can be edited
Build entire scenes using point nodes to create stones, grass, rocks, trees, buildings and stars

items.title: 3D Illustration on Blender 2.8 -3D for Aspiring Illustrators
items.headline: Learn Blender 2.8 from scratch and start modeling cool stuff without drawing skills!
objectives_summary: Create Awesome Illustrations with no drawing skills required!
Basic 3D Modeling techniques (No need of prior experience)

items.title: Blender: create Thor's Stormbreaker from start to finish
items.headline: learn step by step how to create Thor's Ax the StormBreaker with Blender 2.9 and Substance Painter.
objectives_summary: Understand how to use the powerful modeling tools inside Blender
How to use unwrap system to unwrap the 3D model.
How to use vertex paint to prepare the object to send it to Substance Painter.

items.title: Create Stunning Video Transitions in Adobe After Effects
items.headline: Design stunning video slideshows with these transitions quickly & easily in After Effects -Learning By Doing Approach
objectives_summary: BE FAMILIAR WITH Adobe After Effects layout, essential key terms and basic features
ACQUIRE different and powerful skills to video / slideshow transitions in Adobe After Effects
BE AWARE OF some important Adobe After Effects shortcuts

items.title: How to Make an Animated TV-series on a budget
items.headline: How to write great characters and story, how to budget and produce and how to distribute a TV-show on a small budget
objectives_summary: How to make an animated TV-show from the first idea to financing it and producing it

If you love watching animated TV-shows and dream of creating one yourself, or maybe you even have an idea that has been going around your head for a while, but you don´t know where to start. It all feels way too overwhelming. This is the right course for you. Using my own TV-show, Space Yoghurt as a case study, I will show you how you can start to create interesting and unforgetable characters, how to write a good story, but also, how to make a budget, a time schedule and how to find a distribution. Everything you need to know, packed in one.

items.title: Maya for Absolute Beginners : Complete Course
items.headline: Unleash your fear of Maya and start creating awesome 3d content.
objectives_summary: Poly Modelling
UV Unwrapping
Rendering in Arnold

items.title: Low Poly Modeling in Cinema 4D - Vol 1: 3D Buildings
items.headline: Learn to model and texture beautiful low poly buildings in Cinema 4D. Low poly modeling in Cinema 4D: The easy way!
objectives_summary: Create beautiful low poly buildings using Cinema 4D.
Understand the low poly modeling pipeline in Cinema 4D.
Texture low poly objects using selection sets.

items.title: Noobies' Guide to Modelling in Blender 3D
items.headline: This course provides a basic overview of Blender's software interface and helps to develop basic 3D modelling skills.
objectives_summary: Navigate around the 3D software package, Blender.
Build 3D models using primitive shapes.
Build 3D models using extrude, scale, and translate.

items.title: Rendering and Compositing AOV's using Arnold and Nuke
items.headline: Learn how to render and composite multi-pass renders using Maya, Arnold and Nuke.
objectives_summary: In this course, we will learn how to set up multi-pass rendering in Maya / Arnold using AOV's, create custom AOV's for our compositing needs and composite the rendered images in Nuke. We will also learn the OpenEXR workflow in Nuke to make compositing easier.

items.title: UI Animations and Interactions with After Effects
items.headline: Learn how to create smooth interactions for your products
objectives_summary: UI animations and interactions with Adobe After Effects
